outputs.output_descr: The Project Steering Committee (SC) responsible for overseeing project implementation - comprising of key ministries, EU, development partners and UNDP - endorsed the 2010 work plan (annex 1) and agreed on a second project no-cost extension to utilize the remaining funds and continue implementing Objective 2 of the work plan and finish the remaining activities of Objective 1.

The Project Steering Committee (SC) responsible for overseeing project implementation - comprising of key ministries, EU, development partners and UNDP - endorsed the 2010 work plan (annex 1) and agreed on a second project no-cost extension to utilize the remaining funds and continue implementing Objective 2 of the work plan and finish the remaining activities of Objective 1.

project_title: Capacity Development for Aid Management and Coordination
